data.text:
Resume Dhirendra Singh Rawat Email Id : dhirendra.rawat786@gmail.com Contact No : 9837231418, 9870466545 
 CAREER SUMMARY Currently designated as Associate with Cenveo Publisher Services India Ltd. 
 Managing all aspects of production viz. format and page design, galleys and page proofs, page checks, photos and figures, check copy and cover/case design. 
 Worked on complete book production using different platforms, InDesign, Illustrator, Completely XML Workflow Based on, XLT, and PXE_PROJECT, Acrobat (PDF) with Preflight. 
 Adept at interacting with customers, gathering requirements and designing the content in accordance with client specifications. 
 Worked with different client based workflows viz., Nesbitt (Pearson Education), John Wiley, Mcgraw Hill, HMH & Cognella. 
 An excellent communicator coupled with proven flexible, detail-oriented abilities in handling workloads and meeting deadlines. 
 QUALIFICATION: Year Qualification Board/University 2013 M C A UTU, Dehradun 2010 
 BSc(PCM) CDC, Haridwar 2006 12th UK Board 2004 10th UK Board 
 IT SKILLS Work on Epsilon Editor for XML Programming Operation system Macintosh, Windows 
 Photoshop, Illustrator CC, Indesign CC. Equation Editor Power Math & Math Type. 
 Designing Sofwares Proficient in InDesign, Quark Express, Adobe Acrobat. PROJECT MANAGEMENT 
 Analyzing the project and creating the workflow to help in smooth production; involved in planning and allocating projects to production as per the client schedule. 
 Extensively interfacing with the client representatives of an organisation to discuss the project. 
 Identifying the target audience for the required documentation, their roles and the details of the information they need. 
 Estimating the length of time and cost of the project and keeping track of and recording the hours they work to charge their time back to clients. 
 PRODUCTION MANAGEMENT Heading operations entailing quality, content and presentation of schedule as well as coordination with pre and post production teams. 
 Adopting the necessary workflows, templates & tools optimization, process standardization across the value chain. 
 Preparing a critical path schedule or approving a publisher-prepared schedule, including monitoring and maintaining the schedule. 
 ROLE & RESPONSIBILITIES: Working on various design software packages Illustrator, Indesign, Photoshop, Mathtype, Microsoft Office. 
 End to End transform form input into output where input is content in various format- Word file, Mathtype Equation, Scan and Handwritten Text. 
 Design chapters, worksheets, exercises and special layout. Transform rough idea of an image drawn on paper to lively Graphic with neatness and precision with high pixel clarity 
 RELATIONSHIP MANAGEMENT (INTERNAL & EXTERNAL) Relationship management with customer representatives, interested parties & target audience or publishers to establish technical specifications and determine material to be developed. 
 Conducting meetings with team members and management to ensure smooth completion of projects; involved in providing complete resources for the team. 
 Developing and organising training programs on basics of Printing and Graphics and setting targets for the team members according to their skill set. 
 CAREER HIGHLIGHTS Cenveo Publisher Services India Ltd. July 2017 to till date 
 MPS Ltd Dehradun July 2015 to April 2017 Aptara Corp. Aug 2013 to June 2015 
 JOB RESPONSIBILITIES Attending the job launch meeting to take decision about the various parameters of the job such as workflow, complexity level etc. 
 Review the Samples of jobs that are to start. Follow up job guidelines starting the job chapter by chapter, from pagination to final uploading. 
 Take care of the schedule fidelity and strict adherence to the quality index so that our clients can happy. 
 Responsible for planning and allocating projects on daily with a view to meet the schedule. 
 Handled key clients like Nesbitt Pearson, McGraw Hill, OUP, Cengage Book, and Cognella. 
 Actively involved in tracking quality and productivity of the team members. 
 Properly co-ordinate with team people so that the job smoothly day by day upload with mutual understanding. 
 Responsible for planning and allocating projects on daily with a view to meet the schedule. 
 INTERESTS: Travelling to Hill Station Internet Surfing SELF APPRAISAL: Self -Confident 
 Learning Skill DECLARATION: I hereby declare that the above-mentioned information is correct up to my knowledge and I bear the responsibility for the correctness of the above-mentioned particulars. 
 Personal Details: Name : Dhirendra Singh Rawat Father s Name : Hari Singh Rawat 
 Sex : Male Date of Birth : 15-02-1989 Marital Status : Married 
 Nationality : Indian Address : 40 BN PAC Haridwar Phone-No. :
